bibl.title: The Hypotheses of Euripides and Sophocles by ""Dicaearchus"".
bibl.note: 1. The fragments [of hypotheses attributed to Dicaearchus]. - 2. Dicaearchus and the learned hypotheses. - 3. Dicaearchus and the narrative hypotheses [in part. Euripides' Alcestis in P. Oxy. XXVII, 2457 (= M.-P.3 454; LDAB 927)], 1-17. - 4. Pseudo-Dicaearchus or a homonymous grammarian? - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Gertjan Verhasselt, The Hypotheses of Euripides and Sophocles by ""Dicaearchus"".

1. The fragments [of hypotheses attributed to Dicaearchus]. - 2. Dicaearchus and the learned hypotheses. - 3. Dicaearchus and the narrative hypotheses [in part. Euripides' Alcestis in P. Oxy. XXVII, 2457 (= M.-P.3 454; LDAB 927)], 1-17. - 4. Pseudo-Dicaearchus or a homonymous grammarian? - Avec résumé en anglais.
